mapper.insert: insert into tbl_live (live_id, live_path, post_id, live_time) values (tbl_live_seq.nextval, #{live_path}, #{post_id}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update tbl_live set live_path = #{live_path}, live_time = sysdate where live_id = #{live_id}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_live order by live_id desc
